h1: How Many Calories in a Chipotle Bowl?
assumptions: Standard chicken burrito bowl: white rice (4 oz), black beans (4 oz), chicken (4 oz), fajita veggies, mild tomato salsa, cheese (1 oz), lettuce. No guac, sour cream, or extra rice.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by customizations, portion sizes, and location; Chipotle values may differ. Check the Chipotle app or site for exact builds.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle chicken bowl contains about 665 calories with 45 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a chipotle bowl with chicken?
faqs.a: About 665 kcal for a standard build with rice, beans, chicken, veggies, salsa, and cheese.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Typically 70 g carbs, 45 g protein, 25 g fat, and 10 g fiber per standard bowl.

faqs.q: How to make a low-calorie Chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Skip rice, cheese, and guac; opt for salad base with lean protein and veggies for under 400 kcal.

faqs.q: Does brown rice change calories in a Chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Slightly; brown rice adds about 20-30 more kcal than white but more fiber.

faqs.q: Why is sodium high in Chipotle bowls?
